auth.TwoFADisableRequestDto.description: TwoFADisableRequestDto is used to request 2FA disable

auth.TwoFASetupRequestDto.description: TwoFASetupRequestDto is used to request 2FA setup

auth.TwoFASetupResponseDto.description: TwoFASetupResponseDto is used to respond with 2FA setup info

auth.TwoFAVerifyRequestDto.description: TwoFAVerifyRequestDto is used to verify a TOTP code

auth.UpdatePasswordDto.description: UpdatePasswordDto is used for updating user password

interval.description: monitor interval in seconds to do request to url

max_retries.description: Maximum retries before the service is marked as down and a notification is sent

resend_interval.description: Resend Notification if Down X times consecutively

retry_interval.description: Retry interval in seconds to do request to url

timeout.description: monitor timeout in seconds to do request otherwise stop request

type.description: connection type: http, tcp, ping, etc

monitor.StatPointsSummaryDto.description: Stat points and summary for a period

type.description: To organize files in folder structure

publicUrl.description: This might vary based on your S3 setup (CDN, public bucket, etc.)
